Department_Name: Department of Head of the city
Main_Responsibilities: Head of the City and Policy makers.
Manage law enforcement, fire services, and public safety operations.
Oversee construction, maintenance of roads, bridges, and public buildings.
Manage public transport systems, metro services, and traffic flow.
Ensure waste management, clean water supply, and environmental health.
Plan and regulate land use, zoning, and urban development projects.
Respond to emergencies, manage disaster recovery, and medical aid.
Provide health services, welfare programs, and public healthcare.
Oversee public schools, libraries, and community programs.
Manage city finances, budgets, and tax collection.
Develop and manage city tech infrastructure and smart city initiatives.
